title: When is mf update coming.
body:
Cause I haven't played league in months and I want to play MF and GP update.

Also give MF grevious wounds back.
and make W cap at 3 for max damage instead of 5+

Also make R scale with AD.

replies.body: These updates won't be in Patch 5.13, but are coming in the near future. :]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=s2AL9Nf9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-09T16:54:32.959+0000)
>
> These updates won't be in Patch 5.13, but are coming in the near future. :]

Is there a reason why Grievous Wounds was removed from her kit :(

> Is there a reason why Grievous Wounds was removed from her kit :(

I believe they're slowly removing GW, so they can possibly have an easier time balancing heals.

> [{quoted}](name=OverpoweredSoap,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=s2AL9Nf9,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2015-07-09T18:19:02.824+0000)
>
> I believe they're slowly removing GW, so they can possibly have an easier time balancing heals.

I miss Executioner's Calling.

If they remove GW from all champs' kits (I think there will only be one after the MF rework) and put it back on an item, fine.  Don't take it away.  I use it to fight Voli and Dr. Mundo and that kinda hunk-a-junk
there will be two, Katarina ultimate and Varus e, the former having limited use in that kit for the most part.

mmk well I'll be popping in and out to see when that gp/mf update is coming.

MF was the only adc I've ever liked and ever wanted to play.
I've been salty about playing adc role since she was gutted back in season 2 
I've been even saltier because they won't give them back..lol

> [{quoted}](name=lDontLiftIcarry,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=s2AL9Nf9,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-07-09T15:30:26.341+0000)
>
> Also make R scale with AD.

I  mean, it does, though, right? Each hit applies a stack of Impure Shots, which deal damage scaling based on her AD. With the update, there's even an AD-scaling bonus damage applied purely from the ult based on those stacks.

So, I mean, it's *indirect*, but it still scales.

> [{quoted}](name=Jubbinaut,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=s2AL9Nf9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-09T18:23:35.510+0000)
>
> I  mean, it does, though, right? Each hit applies a stack of Impure Shots, which deal damage scaling based on her AD. With the update, there's even an AD-scaling bonus damage applied purely from the ult based on those stacks.
> 
> So, I mean, it's *indirect*, but it still scales.

Yes but the part that scales with AD deals magic damage. So even if you get a black cleaver or a last whisper you're only getting the base damage of the ability. Also having hybrid damaging abilities are not good for the game. They are hard to itemize for and against.

> [{quoted}](name=Jakojo,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=s2AL9Nf9,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-07-09T20:56:37.241+0000)
>
> Yes but the part that scales with AD deals magic damage. So even if you get a black cleaver or a last whisper you're only getting the base damage of the ability. 

You're getting the base damage of the ability plus bonus scaling damage of a type that - if they're counter-building your primary damage type - they can't soak up as well.

> Also having hybrid damaging abilities are not good for the game. They are hard to itemize for and against.

I see no problem with hybrid damage. It creates an interesting question for the opposing team.

To use MF as an example: if they overstack armor to deal with auto-attacks, they remain vulnerable to her Impure Shots. If they build MR to deal with that, they're investing less in armor to handle her normal attacks.

The question of how to address that interests me. It's a type of interplay that I enjoy.
